```{julia}
sum isa Function

typeof(sum)
```
 - typeof(sum) (singleton type of function sum, subtype of Function)

```{julia}
supertype(typeof(sum))
```
 - supertype(typeof(sum)) (supertype of Function)

```{julia}
function print_supertypes(T)
    println(T)
    T == Any || print_supertypes(supertype(T))
    return nothing
end
print_supertypes(Int64)
```
 - print_supertypes(Int64) (prints all supertypes of Int64, starting with Int64, Signed, Integer, Real, Number, Any)

```{julia}
function print_subtypes(T, indent_level = 0)
    println(" "^indent_level, T)
    for S in subtypes(T)
        print_subtypes(S, indent_level + 2)
    end
    return nothing
end
print_subtypes(Integer)
```
  - print_subtypes(Integer) (prints all subtypes of Integer, starting with
   Signed -> BigInt, Int128, Int16, Int32, Int64, Int8; Unsigned -> UInt128, UInt16, UInt32, UInt64, UInt8)
